message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14500. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, based on my budget, I am only able to offer $13500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While I appreciate your interest, $13500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $14000.  This price still leaves room for both of us to be happy with the deal. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I am comfortable with a price of $13800 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
